name: ISOMUSE
description:
ISOMUSE is a music and environmental puzzle adventure game that is currently in development. Play as 1 character that splits into 2, to complete puzzles by working together using their unique abilities.

This is the Tutorial World.

We have been currently working on this project for 7 weeks now, with a team of 3 designers, 2 artists and 2 programmers. Although, not all of our current progress to the game is presented, we will continually update ISOMUSE over the next 7 weeks. We are aiming to have the beta Tutorial World, beta Hub and an alpha World 1 in the next 2 weeks.

It is recommended to play ISOMUSE with a PS4 controller, but PC controls are available.
